data.comment: The match is underway in Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 3, In Vancouver, Ayo Akinola (Toronto) misses the target with a header.
Silviu Petrescu awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Toronto.
In Vancouver, Toronto push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 7, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Toronto are pushing forward but Liam Fraser's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo breaks free at BC Place. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver's Lucas Cavallini scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 17, Ali Adnan instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick Toronto.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Toronto's half?
In the minute 20, Toronto's Jonathan Osorio misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jonathan Osorio gets an equalizer for Toronto. The score is now 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Alejandro Pozuelo.
In the minute 26, Toronto to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Vancouver throw-in in Toronto's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
In the minute 29, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Silviu Petrescu awards Toronto a goal kick.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto just outside Vancouver's area.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver.
In the minute 35, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Toronto's Liam Fraser gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 37, In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vancouver are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ali Adnan of Vancouver gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
Throw-in Toronto.
Goal kick for Toronto at BC Place.
In the minute 43, Toronto awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Vancouver's Ali Adnan has been booked in Vancouver.
In the minute 45, Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Piatti of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 45, Vancouver have a goal kick.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at BC Place.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Erik Godoy with Jake Nerwinski.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 49, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Silviu Petrescu awards Vancouver a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 55, Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo is on target but unsuccessful.
Silviu Petrescu awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Vancouver!
In the minute 57, Goal! Vancouver have got their heads in front thanks to a Michael Baldisimo strike.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Throw-in for Toronto close to the penalty box.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
Toronto are whistled for offside.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 62, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 63, Jozy Altidore is on a sub for Liam Fraser for Toronto.
Toronto's Alejandro Pozuelo gets in a shot on goal at BC Place. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Toronto advance rapidly upfield but Silviu Petrescu blows for offside.
Free kick for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Silviu Petrescu signals a Toronto throw-in in Vancouver's half.
Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 70, Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a second substitution, with Ryan Raposo replacing David Milinkovic.
Nick DeLeon is replacing Ayo Akinola for the away team.
In the minute 71, Alejandro Pozuelo equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
Great play from Pablo Piatti to set up the goal.
Toronto drives forward and Alejandro Pozuelo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Toronto.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Alejandro Pozuelo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Toronto.
Vancouver make their third substitution with Tosaint Ricketts replacing Theo Bair.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Toronto.
In the minute 76, Laurent Ciman (Toronto) has received a yellow card from Silviu Petrescu.
Goal! The home team take a 3-2 lead through Jake Nerwinski.
Andy Rose with an assist there.
In the minute 78, Silviu Petrescu awards the away team a throw-in.
At BC Place, Lucas Cavallini has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 80, Can Toronto get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 81, Chris Mavinga is on a sub for Laurent Ciman for Toronto.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Michael Baldisimo for Vancouver has been booked by Silviu Petrescu and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 83, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Thomas Hasal.
Vancouverâ€™s Thomas Hasal is on his feet again at BC Place.
In the minute 86, Silviu Petrescu signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Auro (Toronto) gets a yellow card.
Vancouver attack but Lucas Cavallini's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 87, Silviu Petrescu awards Toronto a goal kick.
Nick DeLeon of Toronto smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
The match at BC Place has been interrupted briefly for a check on Michael Baldisimo, who is down injured.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Silviu Petrescu.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
Vancouver's Tosaint Ricketts has run offside.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Toronto.
The match is over. Final score 3-2.
Cristian Dajome is replacing Lucas Cavallini for the home team.
Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) has taken off Michael Baldisimo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ranko Veselinovic is the replacement.
The away team replace Justin Morrow with Tsubasa Endoh.
Ryan Raposo (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
